title: Ambiguous error message
body:
by **tristanlawrence**: 
This error message (from 6g):

main.go:71:
 cannot use r (type chan chan func(int)) as type chan <-chan func(int)

is ambiguous. It would be better if it said:

 cannot use r (type chan chan func(int)) as type chan (<-chan func(int))

GOARCH=amd64
GOROOT=/google/src/files/13348130/depot/google3/third_party/go/gc
GOOS=linux
